value.title: Maintain Bar Thickness(Width) in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more Short Video of Power BI. In this video, I'm going to explain how you can maintain the thickness of your bar in  Power BI. value.title: New way to compare Date and DateTime Value in Power BI - August 2021 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more new update from Power BI Desktop. Sometimes we need to compare date or DateTime value in our DAX expression. value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
